snippet: HSU--Ta Chun. The faculty and staff of the Edward Harkness Eye Institute are greatly saddened by the loss of T. C. Hsu, a wonderful friend and member of the Board of Advisors. As past president of The Starr Foundation for more than three decades, T. C. helped to advance the mission of many organizations in the arts and sciences throughout the world. His support of the Starr Retina Research Unit and the Starr Research Scholars enabled pioneering discoveries in eye diseases at Columbia. His warmth, gentlemanly character, and optimism throughout his life will be greatly missed. G. A. Cioffi, M.D., Chairman Stanley Chang, M.D., Chairman Emeritus Sir Howard Stringer, Chairman, Board of Advisors Department of Ophthalmology Columbia University Medical Center 1/3
